record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - March 12, 2008)

[Page: H1561]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, before we resolve into the Committee of the Whole, I ask unanimous consent that Members have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks, and submit matters relevant to consideration of H. Con. Res. 312, Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for Fiscal Year 2009.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from South Carolina?
